Let's Connect

Path

Overview

Path is an online job portal designed for job seekers in Kuwait. It allows registered students to find jobs posted by employers based on their qualifications and preferences.

Key Features:

  • Job matching for students and employers
  • User registration and profile management​

Technology Stack

PHP (Laravel)

MySQL

Back
